events.title: Music Festival
events.description: A day full of live music and fun. Join your favorite artists and enjoy a variety of music genres.

events.title: Art Exhibition
events.description: Explore the latest modern art collection from talented local and international artists.

events.title: Football Match
events.description: Exciting local derby between top teams. Be part of the cheering crowd and enjoy a thrilling match.

events.title: Food Carnival
events.description: Taste the best local and international dishes. A paradise for food lovers with workshops and live cooking.

events.title: Jazz Night
events.description: An elegant evening with smooth jazz performances by renowned musicians.

events.title: Book Fair
events.description: Discover and buy books from various genres, meet authors, and attend workshops.
